Description: Semi-active radar homing missile that homes in on an illumination signal provided by another ship. Without this signal, emitted by an Illuminator dish, the missile cannot home in on a target. Because illuminators are able to provide a much stronger signal than an onboard seeker ever could, the Gale missile is highly resistant to jamming. Size: 2 Cruise Speed: 200 m/s Range: 14,000 m Warhead: Type: Explosive Impact Armor Penetration: 150 cm Component Damage: 1200 hp Blast Angle: 70 Seeker: Type: Semi-Active - RADAR Range: 2,000 m FOV: 50 deg Gain: 30 dB Power: 1 kW Supports TRPs: Yes
